completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith library with 1 part (Java 25 Maven library implementing Humainary Substrates API)
Found 17 existing docs including ARCHITECTURE.md, ASYNC-ARCHITECTURE.md, DEVELOPER-GUIDE.md, 5 examples, benchmark results
Analyzed tech stack: Java 25, Maven, Lombok, Vavr, LMAX Disruptor, JMH. Identified critical performance issue with Circuit implementations.
Created FsOptimizedCircuit, ran benchmarks comparing 4 circuit implementations. Best: Valve 27.6ns (vs Humainary 10.6ns target). Created CIRCUIT-PERFORMANCE-PLAN.md

findings.project_classification: Java 25 library implementing Humainary Substrates API 1.0.0-PREVIEW with 28 main source files, 8 tests, 43 JMH benchmarks
findings.api_reference: substrates-api-java (local clone for API specification reference)

critical_issue.description: Circuit emit latency regressed from ~16ns to ~27ns after code loss

circuit_implementations.valve: 27.6ns - MPSC linked list with node pooling (fastest emit)
circuit_implementations.optimized: 43.9ns - Ring buffer with sequences (most consistent await)

new_files_created.description: New optimized circuit implementation with ring buffer and cache-line padding
JMH benchmark comparing all 4 circuit implementations
Comprehensive performance analysis and improvement plan

resume_instructions: Continue from step 4 - conditional analysis based on project type
